question: Which country's team has won the FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup France 2018?
explanation: On 24 August, the Japan Women\'s National Team has won the 9th edition of 2018 FIFA U-20 Women\'s World Cup tournament by beating the Spanish team 3-1 at the final in France. In Japanese football history, it\'s their first-ever FIFA U-20 Women\'s World Cup title. The FIFA Fair Play Award was goes to Japanese team. It must be noted that France will also host the 2019 FIFA Women\'s World Cup, which is schedule to take place between June-July.
